text: The flag of Tunja () has three horizontal stripes of green, white and green with the coat of arms of Tunja. It was adopted 4 May 2021. == Other flags == File:Escudo JEPG de Armas de la Muy Noble y Muy Leal Ciudad de Tunja D.H.C..JPG|Common civil flag variant without the coat of arms ==References== Category:Colombian municipal flags Tunja
title: Flag of Tunja
